title: As like you, I want to also crack many international olympiads but I am not about any olympiads in class 10. So give me some tips, which book should I follow for that? - Quora

response.answer_text: See you didnt specify the subject you looking for but I will throw some light on Physics. See there are two things you need to learn ConceptsApplications in daily lifeOlympiads will check both of the things deeply. If you have a problem solving aptitude .. Congrats half of your work is done. Maths is the language of universe, so i would suggest you to get really good in advanced calculus (higher level than 12th). Fortunately, you will find a lot of books about it so dont worry. Coming to books Stick to basics, to sharpen the concepts use BM Sharma (Cengage publications) and to dig more into them University Physics. Also, keep your brain open who knows some day you will be out there solving this worlds energy problem. Solve physics questions like programming, breaking them in smaller solvable parts All the best
